title: 马西格雷：我审判
content:
我审判 by 马西格雷（Macy Gray）

 

Games, changes and fears

博弈理论、零钱和恐惧

When will they go from here

当他们都从这里离去

When will they stop

当他们停止

I believe that fate has brought us here

我相信命运使我们相遇

And we should be together, babe

我们应该在一起亲爱的

But we’re not

但我们失败了

I play it off, but I’m dreaming of you

我权衡这个，但我梦你

And I’ll keep my cool, but I’m feignin’

我还将那么酷，但那是佯装

I try to say goodbye and I choke

我尝试说再见但我噎着了

Try to walk away and I stumble

尝试离开但结巴了

Though I try to hide it, it’s clear

我还隐藏它，但它是清晰

My world crumbles when you are not there

我的世界将在你离去的一刻坍塌

Goodbye and I choke

再见并抽泣

I try to walk away and I stumble

我尝试离开但绊倒

Though I try to hide it, it’s clear

我还隐藏它，但它是清晰

My world crumbles when you are not there

我的世界将在你离去的一刻坍塌

I may appear to be free

我看上去可能自由

But I’m just a prisoner of your love

其实只是你爱的囚徒

And I may seem all right and smile when you leave

可能在你离去时我还在OK和微笑状

But my smiles are just a front

但我的笑只是表象

Just a front, hey

只是表象，嘿你妈逼

I play it off, but I’m dreaming of you

我权衡它，但我梦你

And I’ll keep my cool, but I’m feignin’

我还将那么酷，但那是装的

I try to say goodbye and I choke

我尝试说再见但我抽了

Try to walk away and I stumble

尝试离开但绊倒

Though I try to hide it, it’s clear

尽管我尝试隐藏，但它清晰

My world crumbles when you are not there

我的世界将在你离去的一刻坍塌

Goodbye and I choke

再见并抽泣

I try to walk away and I stumble

我尝试离开但绊倒

Though I try to hide it, it’s clear

尽管隐藏但它清晰

My world crumbles when you are not there

我的世界将在你离去的一刻坍塌

Here is my confession

这是我的告白

May I be your possession

我可能是你的拥有

Boy, I need your touch

男孩儿，我需要你摸

Your love, kisses and such

你的爱，吻什么的

With all my might I try

我以我全部的力量去审判

But this I can’t deny

但这个结果我不能否认

Deny

否认

I play it off, but I’m dreaming of you

(but I’m dreaming of you babe)

我梦你

And I’ll keep my cool, but I’m feignin’

我酷我装裤

I try to say goodbye and I choke (yeah)

我尝试再见却抽泣

Try to walk away and I stumble

尝试走开却绊倒

Though I try to hide, it’s clear

尽管隐藏却清晰

My world crumbles when you are not there

(when you are not near aahh)

我的世界没有你会崩溃

Goodbye and I choke (yeah, yeah, yeah)

再见抽泣哦哦哦

I try to walk away and I stumble (hey, hey, hey)

我尝试离开却绊倒

Though I try to hide it, it’s clear (say it Lord)

尽管隐藏却清晰

My world crumbles when you are not there

我的世界没有你会坍塌

Goodbye and I choke (I’m choking)

再见抽泣

I try to walk away and I stumbe

尝试离开却绊倒

Though I try to hide it, it’s clear

尽管隐藏却清晰

My world crumbles when you are not there

(when you are not there, yeah, yeah yeah)

我的世界没有你会坍塌

Yeah, yeah..

呀哑呀。。
